Articles.Content:
Hey everyone. Today I would like to share my first ever functioning SSTO with you all. I suck at names so I went with Borderlands and named my craft after Lilith, The Firehawk. At it's current state it's pretty useless for science(although there is a cargo bay that you can put anything you'd like inside of.)

Features twin Sabre engines that function with air intake or with oxidizer(action group 1 to switch modes)

DL link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nzbaczmx8a3l5cw/FireHawk%20Mk%201_0.craft?dl=0

Nevertheless, here are the mods that I have(not sure which ones are actually used in the plane):

B9 Aerospace

Spaceplanes plus

Mechjeb 2

Interstellar(doubt this one is used)

here are some pictures:

Hope you guys enjoy!

Feel free to edit this thing to whatever you want it to be.

Edited December 15, 2014 by TrainWiz
